lead_paragraph: The San Diego Chargers obtained quarterback Billy Volek from the Tennessee Titans yesterday to give them a veteran behind the first-year starter Philip Rivers. Volek wanted out of Tennessee after being demoted to third string behind the rookie Vince Young after the Titans signed Kerry Collins in August.
